attributes.action: Offer the Nation the Opportunity to REMOVE this government from Power with a Vote of No Confidence through an IMMEDIATE General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government (Labour Party) is currently (and has been doing so since coming to power) ruining this Country beyond recognition. It is simply time for this government to step down and offer the Nation an immediate General Election to prevent any further damage.
